sentences.sentence: We have increased the number of teachers but the size of the classes hasn't changed proportionately.
sentences.translation: 我们已增加了教师的数量，但班级的大小并没有成比例地改变。

sentences.sentence: Prices have risen but wages have not risen proportionately.
sentences.translation: 物价上涨了，但是工资并没有相应增加。

sentences.sentence: In view of the technological improvements in the last few years, business will require in the future proportionately fewer workers than ever before.
sentences.translation: 考虑到过去几年的技术进步，相应地，未来企业所需的工人将比以往任何时候都要少。
